mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oca_extract_belong_place_record_wemedia (extract_name, extract_apptype, extract_date, extract_start_id, extract_end_id, extract_total, extract_cost_time, extract_state) VALUES (#{extractName}, #{extractAppType}, #{extractDate}, #{extractStartId}, #{extractEndId}, #{extractTotal}, #{extractCostTime}, #{extractState})
